proxy_ips.homepage.title: Proxy IPs
proxy_ips.homepage.description: View and manage mappings between IP addresses (BYOIP or static) and zones that are proxied/orange-clouded through Cloudflare.
proxy_ips.homepage.address_map_card.desc: Address Maps tell Cloudflare which IP address a DNS request for a proxied zone should resolve to.
proxy_ips.create_address_map_page.title: Create an Address Map
proxy_ips.add_domains_step.scope_field.z: Map only applies to the zones/domains specified below.
proxy_ips.add_domains_step.scope_field.a: Map applies to all zones/domains in this account.
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.add_ip_f: List the IPv4 or IPv6 records you want associated with this map.
proxy_ips.add_ip_addresses_step.referenc: Here are the available BYOIP prefixes and static IPs in this account.
proxy_ips.create_address_map_page.add_de: Add a description for this map (optional)
proxy_ips.review_step.description: Check your map configurations before deploying it. To make changes, press the "Previous" button
proxy_ips.links.create_address_map.label: Create new address map
